u_{t}+uu_{x}-\nu u_{xx}=\xi(t,x).

\langle\xi(t,x)\xi(t_{1},x_{1})\rangle=-\nu\beta^{-1}\delta^{\prime\prime}(x-x% _{1})\delta(t-t_{1}).

caligraphic-P OPEN:[ italic-u CLOSE:] RELOP:equals caligraphic-N OPFUNCTION:exponential OPEN:{ ADDOP:minus italic-beta caligraphic-F OPEN:[ italic-u CLOSE:] CLOSE:} PUNCT:, caligraphic-F OPEN:[ italic-u CLOSE:] RELOP:equals INTOP:integral italic-d italic-x italic-u POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start NUMBER:2 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-x CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
{\cal P}[u]={\cal N}\exp\left\{-\beta{\cal F}[u]\right\},\quad{\cal F}[u]=\int% \,dx\,u^{2}(x).

\langle u(t,x)u(t,x^{\prime})\rangle=(2\beta)^{-1}\delta(x-x^{\prime}).

F_{2}(T,x)=(2\beta)^{-1}\left\langle\frac{\delta u(0,0)}{\delta u(T,x)}\right\rangle.

F_{n+2}=\left\langle u(T,x)\prod\limits_{j=1}^{n}u(0,y_{j})\;u(0,0)\right% \rangle\sim F_{2}(T,x)\sim\exp\left(-\frac{\beta x^{3}}{3T^{2}}\right).
